  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface AtmInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAtmState()
      Method to get the ATM state THis is initiated when the ATM is switched ON 0- OFF_STATE 1- IDLE_STATE 2- SERVING_CUSTOMER_STATE
      boolean getAtmStatus()
      Method to identify whether ATM is switched on
      java.lang.String getSessionState()
      Method to get session state This is initiated when the ATM card is inserted 1- READING_CARD_STATE 2- READING_PIN_STATE 3- CHOOSING_TRANSACTION_STATE 4- PERFORMING_TRANSACTION_STATE 5- EJECTING_CARD_STATE 6- FINAL_STATE
      Transaction getTransaction() 
      java.lang.String getTransactionState()
      Method to get the transaction state This is initiated when transaction type is selected 1- GETTING_SPECIFICS_STATE 2- SENDING_TO_BANK_STATE 3- INVALID_PIN_STATE 4- COMPLETING_TRANSACTION_STATE 5- PRINTING_RECEIPT_STATE 6- ASKING_DO_ANOTHER_STATE

      Method to trigger cad insert
